description.displayText: Although our time was short, I highly recommend Sylvia as a babysitter. Our little one just returned from an international trip and experienced jet lag, but with Sylvia's help, he quickly overcame it. She follows our guidelines as an example and keeps us updated on how things are going with our baby. She is friendly, responsible, caring and dedicated to providing a safe, fun and mutually environment. We are grateful for her exceptional care. Thank you, Sylvia!
